extendedInfo.description: This theme requires:â GO SMS (http://bit.ly/tHqrr4)GOES WELL WITHâº Dark Swift Pink GO SMS: http://bit.ly/Wl3DMqâº Dark Swift Pink GO Keyboard: http://bit.ly/SbVyeyFEATURESâº Crisp graphicsâº Thoroughly skinnedâº Hot pink highlightsâº Accessible through TouchPal Keyboard's Settings!INSTALL1. Close out of the Play Store2. Open TouchPal Keyboard Settings. You can do so by opening the keyboard and hitting the button on the top left or by going into device settings -> language & keyboard -> TouchPal v5 -> General Settings3. Go to Skin, select the skin and hit the check mark to applySUPPORTIf you have any questions or wish to make a request, refer to our contact address or social addresses below!You can also get in touch with us through:â Twitter (@aBbtdesigns): http://bit.ly/xqfEl1â Facebook (aBbtdesigns): http://on.fb.me/yO5ULmKeywords: ultra, perfect, smart, better, colorful, black, dark

reviews.title: No longer supports Touchpal
reviews.comment: I love the skins but since Touchpals recent update they dont support these skins anymore...Uninstalled Touchpal and unfortunantly now I have to uninstall 2 skins that I PURCHASED from you guys as early as yesterday...Going back to Swiftkey.
reviews.author: Kristal Keiper

reviews.title: Great theme
reviews.comment: Wish there were more awesome touch pal themes like this one.  Its a great keyboard. Probably one of the best
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: The design is smooth I love it.
reviews.author: A Google User
